summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Taam Jham luxury restaurant website. All backend APIs functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI fully responsive with working parallax effects, menu navigation, and contact form integration.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 10 endpoints (100% success rate)
Hero section with parallax food explosion effect on mouse movement
Navigation bar with smooth scrolling to all sections (Menu, About, Contact)
Menu tabs switching between all 5 cuisines (North Indian, Italian, Indo-Chinese, Fast Food, Beverages)
Menu items display with images, prices, veg/non-veg badges, and popular indicators
GET /api/menu/categories returns exactly 5 categories as expected
GET /api/menu?category filtering works for all categories
Contact form submission working with POST /api/contact
About section displays restaurant story and stats (years, dishes, customers)
Contact section displays address, phone, and hours information
Responsive design and luxury aesthetic implementation
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Fonts implemented correctly (Playfair Display, Manrope, Cinzel)
Dark cinematic luxury theme with gold accents
